altTitles.ru: Младший сын семьи Пэн из Хэбэя

description.en:
Habuk Peng Family’s best strength, Peng Jihyuk heads to the Nakho Region to save his family that fell into destruction due to the attack of the Demon Sect, but everything was a trap. At the moment of death, he felt the wrath of being the only one left from his beloved family.

‘Again…if you give me a chance…!”

Peng Jihyuk, who thought he was dead, woke up in the body of Young Master Sa, of the Peng Family.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.ko:
하북팽가 최고의 전력, 도왕 팽지혁. 마교의 습격으로 멸문지화에 빠진 가문을 구하러 낙호곡으로 향하지만 모든 것은 함정이었고, 죽음의 순간 자신이 사랑했던 가문에게 버림받았다는 사실에 분노한다.
'다시... 내게 한 번만 더 기회가 주어진다면...!'
죽은 줄 알았던 팽지혁은 방구석 둔재, 하북팽가 사공자의 몸에서 눈을 뜬다.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.ru:
Пэн Джи Хёк — лучший воин семейства Пэн из Хэбэя. Из-за атаки Магё его семейство почти исчезло... Для её спасения он отправляется в дальнее путешествие, во время которого попадает в ловушку. За мгновение до смерти он узнал, что его горячо любимая семья от него отказалась, и пришёл в ярость.
«Если бы у меня был ещё один шанс!..»
Он уже был готов к встрече со смертью, но когда открыл глаза — оказался в теле молодого господина.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.zh:
一代刀王重生废柴四公子！
为报恩逆袭勇斗魔教！
名门彭家的最强战斗力，刀王彭枝奕。为了拯救因魔教的袭击而陷入灭门之灾的彭家，彭枝奕前往落虎谷与魔教教主决战，却发现这一切都是个陷阱。临死之前得知自己被深爱的家族抛弃的彭枝奕愤怒不已。彭枝奕原以为自己死了，没想到却在彭家四公子的身体里重新醒了过来。

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)

altTitles.ja: 宵明けてロマネスク

description.en: Tokyo in the early Showa period. Genichiro is assigned to a popular writer, Yuzuru Nijo. However, he finds out that the writer, whom he thought was a man, is actually a girl!

Living in a country where every teen is totally immersed in games, Kang Eun Jung is the complete opposite. As someone who isn't really into games, she is often neglected by her friends. Due to how inconspicuous she has become, she is challenged by her brother to play a game, and that is how she, a fresh newbie, begins to experience various brand new feelings in the RPG world.

title.en: From a Knight to a Lady

altTitles.vi: Cách mà người Hiệp Sĩ đó sống như một Tiểu Thư

altTitles.en: How that knight lives as a lady
The Way That Knight Lives as a Lady

altTitles.es: La Forma en que el Caballero Vive Como una Dama

description.en:
The sword of my closest friend and trusted adjutant pierced my body. When I opened my eyes again, I had become a noble lady of the enemy kingdom. In an unfamiliar and weak stranger’s body, three year’s time was lost, in which my homeland was brought to ruin. I was unable to come to my senses because of the pain of betrayal and confusion of my identity. However, eventually I decided to live on as 'Luciphella Aidine', a noble who wields a sword.  


---
description.es: La espada de mi amigo más cercano y ayudante de confianza atravesó mi cuerpo. Cuando volví a abrir los ojos, me había convertido en una noble dama del reino enemigo. En el cuerpo de un extraño desconocido y débil, se perdieron tres años en los que mi patria fue arruinada. No pude recuperar el sentido debido al dolor de la traición y la confusión de mi identidad. Sin embargo, finalmente decidí seguir viviendo como 'Luciphella Aidine', una noble que empuña una espada.
description.ru:
Рыцарь Эстель стала жертвой предательства и погибла ещё до финального сражения. От руки своего друга. Вот только попала она в свой личный ад. С войны на бал! В тело леди Люцифелии, невесты своего врага. Теперь её убийца постоянно находится рядом с ней. Полководец вражеской армии её жених, а она, смелый и благородный рыцарь, стала хрупкой леди, что и меча в руках не держала.  
Как выжить, не запутавшись в дворцовых интригах и светской жизни? Как затуманить разум своего врага, чтобы он ни о чём не догадался? И как тут найти любовь?
description.vi:
Thanh gươm của bạn thân và cũng là phụ tá đáng tin tưởng của tôi xuyên qua cơ thể của tôi.  
  
Khi mà tôi mở mắt ra, tôi đã trở thành một tiểu thư của một nhà quý tộc của phe địch của Vương quốc. Trong một cơ thể yếu đuối của một người lạ, ba năm đã trôi qua trong thời gian đó, đất mẹ của tôi đã bị hủy diệt. Tôi không thể hiểu được bất cứ chuyện gì vì nỗi đau của sự phản bội và sự hoang mang về danh tính của tôi.  
  
Thế nhưng, tôi đã quyết định sẽ sống như 'Luciphella Aidine', một quý tộc cầm một thanh kiếm.  


---

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスターSPECIAL ソード・シールド

description.en: Pokemon Sword and Shield Manga Adaptation, featuring Gear Meister Soudo and computer scientist Schildemilia.

altTitles.ja: 放課後プレイ
放課後プレイ D
放課後プレイ High Heels
放課後プレイ Maniax
放課後プレイ R

description.en:
In the Houkago Play Series:  
  
V.1: 4-koma about a high-school gamer and his bossy but tsundere girlfriend.  
V.2: About a gamer and his mangaka girlfriend.  
V.3: About a boy and a girl who are both gamers, though they play with different styles.  
V.4: R  
V.5: High Heels  
V.6: Maniax  
V.7: High Heels 2  
V.8: High Heels 3

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

description.en:
The original owner died at the hands of others, the next second the successor of the Heaven's Godly Healing Needle crawled out of the grave!   
Clothes bloodied red; heart ice cold!  
Nasty relatives? No worries! One prick of a silver needle guarantees obedience!  
Appearance ruined and fingers broken? Can’t practice medicine or cultivate?  
Easy! Fix appearance, reform muscles and bones, dazzle and blind every bastard's eyes!  
He, is Xia Dynasty’s most adored official; arrogant and addicted to killing.  
Yet the first time he saw her, he immediately entered wife-pampering mode. She, who returned mightily, with world shocking abilities, relied on her poison needle to aid him in achieving dominance.

Kim Seojoon, a freshman college student leading a normal daily life, awoke one day to find himself transported into a fantasy world straight out of a webtoon or web novel or something like that. 

As he began to get excited about potentially having the role of a male lead character, a shocking event unfolded before his eyes—a murder of an imperial family. Consequently, Kim Seojoon found himself imprisoned in the world's prison, 'Gehenna'.

Will he be able to navigate the treacherous paths of this unfamiliar world?

Masks are art, dance is martial arts!
The despised mask dancer 'Bongsan' follows the map left by his master
To stop the monster tiger 'Saphung Black Tiger' who wants to become king
He sets out on an adventure to find the legendary 'Human Mask'...

Legend says that a being stronger than any other, a being feared by both angels and demons, a being completely OVER THE TOP (aka OTT) will be awakened in the near future. But our average high school boy Jae-ik doesn’t care much for this legend... until he turns 19 and members of Heaven and Hell desperately attempt to win him over. Will our soon-to-be fearsome (and uninterested) OTT be able to pick a side? Well, we'll see once the dust of the recruiting war settles.

altTitles.en: I Picked It Up From Another World
I Picked a Mobile From Another World

altTitles.ja: 別の世界から拾ってきました

altTitles.vi: Tôi nhặt được điện thoại từ thế giới khác

description.en:
In the midst of the devastation, only the soldiers’ bones remained.
It’s only a matter of time before the entire world is annihilated. To avoid this, Kyung-Hoon began searching for clues in another universe with the help of a ten-year-old phone he discovered in an abandoned building.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EB%A5%B8-%EC%84%B8%EA%B3%84%EC%97%90%EC%84%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%8C%EC%99%94%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2408)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73500)
description.ja:
ある日、目が覚めるとなんと…見知らぬ廃虚にいた。 そこには無数の白骨化した死体に巨大なネズミ！？ なんとここは、滅亡した世界線の日本！ 元の世界がこうなるのも時間の問題…平行世界で手がかりを見つけ、滅亡を止めるんだ！

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EB%A5%B8-%EC%84%B8%EA%B3%84%EC%97%90%EC%84%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%8C%EC%99%94%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2408)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73500)
description.ko:
낯선 곳에서 눈을 떴다.
폐허가 된 주변, 뼈만 남겨진 군인의 시체.
이곳은 멸망한 서울!!!!
이대로 멸망한 세계처럼 되는 건 시간문제?!
다른 세계에서 단서를 찾아, 멸망을 막아야 한다.

***

킹메이커 작가님의 <다른 세계에서 주워왔습니다> 본격 웹툰화!

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EB%A5%B8-%EC%84%B8%EA%B3%84%EC%97%90%EC%84%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%8C%EC%99%94%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2408)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73500)
description.ru:
Я открыл глаза в незнакомом месте. Вокруг развалин были только тела и кости погибших солдат. Это разрушенный Сеул!!! Лишь вопрос времени, когда этот мир заменит мой. Я должен найти улики в параллельном мире и предотвратить его разрушение.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EB%A5%B8-%EC%84%B8%EA%B3%84%EC%97%90%EC%84%9C-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9B%8C%EC%99%94%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2408)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73500)
description.vi: Giữa cảnh hoang tàn, chỉ còn lại xương cốt của những người lính. Việc cả thế giới bị diệt vong chỉ là vấn đề thời gian. Để tránh điều này, Kyung-Hoon đã bắt đầu tìm kiếm manh mối ở một vũ trụ khác, với sự trợ giúp của chiếc điện thoại mười năm tuổi mà cậu phát hiện trong một tòa nhà bỏ hoang...

description.en:
Children who are beginning their youth.  
Their growing pain on their way to spring.

title.en: Legacy of the Skipped Hero: Second-Class Ascendant

description.en:
Douji, a renowned marksman specialist and the top strategist in gaming, known for skipping through content at double speed and ignoring anything not summarized in three lines, decides to take on the challenge of Ferrerus, which is a game of "Land of Hardship" in the gaming world.

Despite his usual nonchalant approach, Douji finds himself forcefully transitioned into the hidden class of "Skip Warrior" within the perilous depths of Ferrerus, where even gamers who can't spare a moment for footnotes tremble.

With this melee-oriented hidden class, can Douji reclaim his former glory and ascend once more to the top rank?

title.en: Demon X Angel, Can't Get Along!

altTitles.zh: 恶魔X天使 不能友好相处

altTitles.en: Demon X Angel Can't Get Along!

altTitles.ar: ملاك و شيطان! لا يمكن ان نتعايش

altTitles.pt-br: Demônio X Anjo, Não Conseguem Se Dar Bem!

altTitles.vi: Oan gia chung nhà: Thiên thần x Ác quỷ, sao mà thân được!?

description.ar: الشياطين والملائكة نوعان من الأجناس المتقابلة مع مرور الزمن سئموا من القتال ضد بعضهم بعض ولكي يتعايشوا بسلام سويا قرروا البدء بخطة زواج! الخطة لها فترة مراقبة مدتها عام واحد. إذا كان الشيطان والملاك لا يزالان غير قادرين على العيش سويا وفهم بعضهم البعض بشكل جيد ، فسيتم إلغاء الزواج و نتيجة لذلك ، تم اختيار جيا تشينغ (الشيطان) و يو شانشان (الملاك) بواسطة اليانصيب كشريكين في الزواج ، وبدأت حياتهم سويا كزوجين يجب عليهم التعايش معا بشكل جيد.
description.en: Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. Sharing the goal of divorce, the two began their lives of "happy" cohabitation!
description.pt-br: Demônios e anjos são duas raças opostas. À medida que os tempos mudam, eles estão cansados ​​de lutar. Para conviverem pacificamente, decidiram iniciar um plano de casamento! O plano tem um período de observação de um ano. Se os demônios e os anjos ainda não se derem bem, o casamento será cancelado. Como resultado, Jiacheng (demônio) e Yu Shanshan (anjo) foram “felizmente” selecionados por sorteio como parceiros de casamento, e começaram uma vida de coabitação “feliz” com o destino do divórcio.

description.en:
Hong Il-tak, the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname, he's a boy, and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders, and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy. 

In the past, until his sophomore year, Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin, but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain... 

"His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!" 

After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers, Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks... 

"If I can befriend this guy, who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School, I'll be able to move up again!" 

But for some reason, Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?

A boy’s life is turned upside down when monsters attack take everything away from him. The monsters hold him captive as their endless supply of food because of his regenerative ability.
For years, he grunts his teeth and seeks revenge. However, he lacks the power to beat the monsters and gain freedom.
One day, a monster hunter appears…
A story of divine powers and the boy named “Lizard tail” on his mission to eradicate monsters.
description.ko:
악마에게 모든 걸 잃고 먹이로 사육당하는 소년.
이를 갈며 복수를 갈망하지만 인간의 힘은 악마에게 닿지 못했다.
그때 그의 앞에 신군이 나타난다.
2020 지상최대공모전 2기 장려상 수상작!
description.ru:
В мире бесчинствуют демоны. Они нападают на поселения людей и оставляют за собой лишь разруху.
Мальчик по имени Тома - очередная жертва нападения демонов. Но, вместо смерти, его настигла более ужасная участь, и всё из-за его способностей.
Став заложником демонов, страдая изо дня в день, он копил свою злобу, страстно желая отомстить за свою деревню и родных людей.
Но на что способен обычный мальчишка?
Время шло, и однажды явился он - один из бойцов "Новой армии"...

description.en: “Take the prettiest women, ride the fastest war horse, wield the strongest weapon, one rider blocking the GuanDong 18 roads*. One man standing against ten thousand, they bow to this hero of turbulent times. People say if Lu Bu doesn’t die, there will be no opportunity to cause chaos. I laugh at all the hypocrites in the world; there are no other heroes besides Feng Xian. Entering the life story of more than a thousand reincarnations, experiencing the many vicissitudes of life, tempered into steel. Can the current Lu Bu Feng Xian withstand the inevitable end at Bai Men Lou?”

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken: After the Rain

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件 after the rain

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais: After the Rain

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten: After the Rain

altTitles.uk: Сусідський ангел сильно мене балує: Бісля дощу

description.en: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まり二人は少しずつ惹かれあっていく――。

title.en: Uchi ni Kaeru to Itsumo Kukkoro ga Iru

altTitles.ja: 家に帰るといつもくっころが居る

description.en: A high school student planning to live alone decides to rent a "stigmatized property" where the ghost of a female knight appears!
The moment the red moon appeared in the sky, everyone went crazy. Except for me!

‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

title.en: I Became a First-Class Guide Thanks to My Childhood Friends

altTitles.zh: 靠发小我变身顶级向导

description.en: [The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?] D-class guide Qiao Yang, because of a drunken accident, discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels, his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan, to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status, he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However, during the repeated interaction with the two, he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him...

altTitles.ja: 彼女のカレラ
My Favorite Carrera

description.en: The main character’s father passes away. The will states that each of the three siblings receive a portion of the father’s wealth. The main character receives a Porsche Carrera. She doesn’t know what a Porsche Carrera looks like, didn’t know the car company Porsche, can’t drive a manual and had absolutely no interest in cars, at the time.

altTitles.uk: Чи правда, що ви одружуєтесь? [365 днів до весілля]

altTitles.ja: 結婚するって、本当ですか

altTitles.th: แต่งงานที่ว่านี่เรื่องจริงเหรอครับ?

altTitles.ja: 結婚するって、本当ですか 365 Days To The Wedding

altTitles.ja-ro: Kekkon Surutte, Hontou desu ka: 365 Days To The Wedding

altTitles.vi: 365 Ngày Cho Đến Lúc Hai Ta Kết Hôn
Chúng Ta Sẽ Kết Hôn Thật Sao?

altTitles.ja-ro: Kekkon suru tte, Hontou desu ka

description.en: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
description.ja:
首都圏の旅行代理店、JTCの企画部に勤めるタクヤとリカは、共に人付き合いが苦手で目立たないが、充実した一人生活を送っていた。ところがシベリアの支店開設により独身者が優先で海外派遣されることになり、困ったリカはタクヤにとある計画を持ちかけて……。ほとんどしゃべったこともない二人が、たったの365日後に結婚することに！？

### 登場人物紹介
 
* 大原拓也●旅行代理店JTCの企画部所属。弱っている猫を保護している。やっと慣れてきた所なので家を離れたくない。

* 本成寺莉香●拓也の1年先輩。 クールに見えるが実は極度の人見知りで海外などもってのほか。 地図さえあれば幸せ。
description.ru: Такуя и Рика — коллеги по туристическому агентству, они практически не общались друг с другом, так как оба — интроверты. Оба заняты своим делом, как обычно, когда приходит объявление от вышестоящего руководства: через год в Сибири откроется зарубежный филиал, и сотрудник из их отдела будет отправлен туда на работу! Неизвестно, кого выберут, но объяснили, что вероятность того, что туда отправят женатых и имеющих семьи, гораздо ниже, чем одиночек! Ни Такуя, ни Рика не хотят ехать в Сибирь! Отчаявшись защитить свою одинокую жизнь, они придумывают план: сделать вид, что женятся друг на друге! Смогут ли они продержаться 365 дней и, может быть, даже влюбиться друг в друга за это время?
description.uk: Гонджоуджі Ріка та Оогара Такуя працюють у відділі планування туристичної агенції JTC в Токіо, вони не люблять спілкуватися і повноцінно живуть спокійним життям наодинці. Однак через відкриття філії в Сибіру Ріка запропонувала Такуї план, щоб не відправитися за кордон. Чи одружаться ці двоє замкнутих людей всього за 365 днів?
description.vi: Takuya và Rika là đồng nghiệp trong một công ty lữ hành ở Tokyo. Cả hai đều độc thân, nhưng họ không bận tâm, vì họ là những người hướng nội với cuộc sống viên mãn ở nhà. Thật không may, giờ công việc của họ là tìm kiếm nhân viên cho một văn phòng ở Siberia, và những nhân viên chưa kết hôn là những người đầu tiên được cân nhắc. Rika rất muốn tránh việc chuyển công tác và đến gặp Takuya với một ý tưởng: nếu họ giả vờ kết hôn sau một năm, họ có thể ở lại Tokyo. Vấn đề duy nhất là cả hai hầu như không biết nhau! Nếu hai người đồng nghiệp trầm tính này "giả vờ" một mối quan hệ, liệu nó có trở thành một mối quan hệ thực sự không?
description.pt-br: Takuya e Rika são colegas de trabalho de uma agência de viagens e quase nunca interagiram, pois ambos são introvertidos, pessoas anti-sociais. Ambos estão fazendo seu trabalho normalmente quando um anúncio dos superiores chega: em um ano, uma filial no exterior será aberta na Sibéria, e um funcionário de sua localidade será enviado para trabalhar lá! Embora não se saiba quem será escolhido para ir, explica-se que as pessoas que são casadas e têm família são muito menos propensas a serem enviadas! Nem o Takuya nem a Rika querem ir para a Sibéria! Desesperados para proteger suas vidas solitárias, eles criam um plano: fingir que vão se casar um com o outro! Serão capazes de manter esta farsa por 365 dias, e, talvez, até se apaixonar um pelo o outro nesse tempo?

altTitles.ja: 宅配員のおねえさんがやってきた

title.en: Memoir of the God of War

altTitles.en: Memoir of the King of War

altTitles.ja: 戦王伝記

description.en:
Breathing does not guarantee everyone’s alive! Dan Sa Yu, a descendant of Goryeo, greatly reprimands the Central District for the sake of his friend whom he treasures the most. He reigns every battle! No one could stop him! Cheonpo Armed Forces. The greatest martial arts of Goryeo! The legend of Cheonpo Armed Forces lives on while the history of the King of War unfolds!

---
* [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000047611)
* [Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80868)
* [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1laU4XdlpNc)
description.ja:
息をしているからといって、生きているわけではない！ 高麗の子孫である単砂流（たんさりゅう）、彼は大切な友人のために中原を駆け抜ける。 彼は戦の支配者！誰も彼を止めることはできない！ 天砲武将類（てんほうぶしょうるい）、それは高麗の偉大なる武功！ 天砲武将類の伝説は永久で、戦王の壮大な歴史が幕を開く！

---
* [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000047611)
* [Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80868)
* [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1laU4XdlpNc)
description.ko:
숨을 쉰다고 해서 모두가 살아있는 것은 아니다!

고려의 후예 단사유, 가장 소중한 친구를 위해 중원을 질타하다.
그는 전투에서 군림하는 자! 누구도 그를 막을 수 없다!

천포무장류. 위대한 고려의 절대 무공!
천포무장류의 전설은 영원하고, 전왕(戰王)의 위대한 역사가 펼쳐진다!

---
* [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000047611)
* [Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80868)
* [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1laU4XdlpNc)
description.ru:
То, что ты жив, покажет не стук твоего сердца! Дан Саю, потомок Горё, которому нет равных в бою, решил отплатить сполна Чон Вону за своего дорогого друга. Никто его не остановит! Чхонпо наращивает боевую мощь. Полная безнаказанность, которую нельзя оставить без внимания! Легенды о боевых искусствах Чхонпо будут жить вечно, а великому сказанию о бывшем короле лишь предстоит начаться!

---
* [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000047611)
* [Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/80868)
* [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1laU4XdlpNc)

description.en:
“Who created humans?”

“Why do humans die?”

“How did love coexist with war?”

The primal curiosities of humans regarding life and death are combined with lively imagination to create mythological stories that make us laugh and cry. These myths originate from the “first myths discovered in the first civilization of humanity” – [Mesopotamian Myths]!

altTitles.ja: 犬の黒人男性

description.en:
Rex is a half man half dog. He was created when a drunk old man forced himself on a stray female dog in the street. 
Because of his father, Rex has to live his life as a freak rejected by society.
So one day he’s gonna find that man, and RAPE him.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [MANGA Plus Creators](https://medibang.com/mpc/titles/wt2208302035572710014241408/) | [ART street](https://medibang.com/book/xb2005061537310810014241408/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/61917191/series/172665)
- Discord - [Server](https://discord.gg/BzQXA4vwXt)
description.fr: Rex est moitié humain et moitié chien. Il est né quand un vieux mec bourré a baisé une chienne errante dans le rue. À cause de son père, Rex doit vivre en étant rejeté par la société. Alors un jour… il va retrouver ce type, et le VIOLER
description.hr:
Rex je polu čovjek, polu pas. Nastao je kada je pijani starac silovao kuju lutalicu na ulici.
Zbog svog oca, Rex mora živjeti svoj život kao nakaza koju društvo odbacuje.
Zato će jednog dana pronaći tog starca i SILOVATI ga.
description.ru: Рекс - наполовину человек, наполовину собака. Он был создан, когда пьяный старик изнасиловал собаку на улице. Из-за отца Рекс вынужден жить как урод, отвергнутый обществом. Так что однажды... он найдет этого человека и отомстит ему.
description.uk: Рекс - напівлюдина напівсобака. Він був створений коли дуже п'яне чмо трахнуло вуличну собаку. Через нього він став потворою та ізгоєм. Тож одного дня... він знайде свого "татуся", і зґвалтує ЙОГО!
description.es-la: Rex es un híbrido mitad hombre, mitad perro. Fue creado cuando un viejo borracho abusó sexualmente de una perra callejera en la calle. Por culpa de su padre, Rex tiene que vivir su vida como un fenómeno, rechazado por la sociedad. Así que un día… encontrará a ese tipo y lo v*olará.

title.en: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returns From Another World Goes Back to When He Was 17 and Becomes Unbeatable

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りのアラフォーリーマン、17歳の頃に戻って無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Kaeri no Arafour Riiman, 17-sai no Koro ni Modotte Musou suru

description.en:
A black company employee in his 40s, Namba Kazu, died of overwork and was reincarnated to another world. After saving the world, he returns to find himself regressed to his 17-year-old self. 

Kazu realizes that he can use the abilities he acquired from another world and is excited to restart his life over again. However, through the help of his childhood friend, Yui, he learns of the existence of human-eating abomination called Variant in the world he was born in. 

Kazu knows from his past memories that Yui will die in the near future. In order to save Yui, who is on a mission to fight against variants, Kazu decided to throw himself into battle in this world as well.
description.ja:
過労死で異世界に転生したアラフォーリーマンの難波カズ。17歳で異世界を救ったカズは、女神に「元の世界に戻してくれ」と願う。てっきり元のアラフォーリーマンに戻ると思っていたら、17歳の高校生に戻っていた。

それならばと気楽に90年代を満喫しようとしていたが、幼馴染みの由依をきっかけに『人間を喰う異形ヴァリアント』の存在を知り、カズは異世界チートを武器にこの世界でも戦いに身を投じていく…!
description.es-la: Kazu Nanba reencarnó después de la muerte por exceso de trabajo y salvó otro mundo. A la edad de 17 años en el otro mundo después de morir derrotando al rey demonio elije "regresara a su mundo original". Pensó que regresaría a su trabajo normal, pero regreso como un estudiante de secundaria de 17 años. Sin embargo ahora se entera que hay "extrañas criaturas" que matan humanos y donde Kazu recordara un recuerdo pasado donde su amiga de la infancia Yui morirá en un futuro cercano. Esta vez, para salvar a Yui, Kazu usará el poder de otro mundo para lanzarse también a la batalla en este mundo.

description.en: Cute, smart, and introverted disciple X cold, strict, and beautiful master. In order to pursue the cold male god from the train, Dong Zhi worked hard to get admitted into the department of public service — the ministry of exorcism. Not only is he working day in and day out, he constantly puts his life on the line and has to dodge all kinds of dangers, isn’t chasing this male god too strenuous?

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

title.en: Ashita mo Kimi ni Ai ni Iku

altTitles.ja: 明日もきみに会いに行く

description.en:
University student Saku longs to have a fairytale romance, but even though he has no trouble getting with girls, they all break up with him for the same reason: he doesn't make their heart flutter at all!

And then there's Misumi, the university's resident heartthrob who's wildly popular with the girls, and who's taken a sudden interest in Saku. He doesn't laugh at Saku's fantasies and listens to them sincerely, and if Saku is nearby, he'll go to him without fail. Misumi seems to always say or do the right things that make his own heart start to flutter a little, so Saku starts to look to him for tips and techniques on how to make his fairytale romance come true.

But before he knows it, he's suddenly falling in love with Misumi instead...?!

altTitles.ja: エクセル♥サーガ
エクセル・サーガ

description.en:
When discussing conquest, Il Palazzo's motto would most likely be "start small." ACROSS, a group devoted to carrying out and accomplishing the ideals of absent-minded yet bishounen Il Palazzo, feels that the first step in conquering the entire planet would be conquering a single city. This city just so happens to be Fukuoka, where our story takes place.
___
**Official English (Digital):** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/excel-saga)

altTitles.ja: 燕は戻ってこない

description.en:
A struggling 29-year-old single woman faces hardships due to irregular employment in her dream city, Tokyo. Hearing from a coworker that it can be a good side-income, she decides to offer her uterus to a stranger and become a surrogate mother.

(Source: Manga Mogura RE, edited)

Note: Based on the novel of the same name by Natsuo Kirino.

altTitles.ja: バーサス

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
___
**Compositor:** [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71)

**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

altTitles.vi: Chàng Rể Mạnh Nhất Lịch Sử

description.en:
Shen Lang traveled to the past and became a matrilocal son-in-law of a wealthy family. And yet he was kicked out for being a good-for-nothing. So he swore that he would marry a more powerful and striking noblewoman.

I'm not going to practice martial arts in my whole life! I'll groom my wife to be the No.1 martial master in the world! She will kick the ass of anyone who dares to mess with me!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32611)
description.pt-br: Sheng lang foi expulso de casa por ser um desperdício de comida e oxigênio, coisas aconteceram e ele acabou em outro mundo, para sobreviver nesse novo mundo ele precisa aprender artes marciais mas como ele é muito preguiçoso e fraco ele concluiu que sua melhor opção é encontrar uma esposa bonita, rica e talentosa e ser apenas um marido troféu que passa seus dias aproveitando as riquezas da vida!! E se alguém se atreve a perturbar sua paz, ele vai dizer a sua esposa para chutar seus traseiros!!!

title.en: Otsubone Reijou to Shiyuka no Kisetsu

altTitles.ja: お局令嬢と朱夏の季節
お局令嬢と朱夏の季節 〜冷徹宰相様のお飾りの妻になったはずが、溺愛されています〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Otsubone Reijou to Shiyuka no Kisetsu: Reitetsu Saishou-sama no Okazari no Tsuma ni Natta Hazu ga, Dekiaisareteimasu

altTitles.en: The Noble Spinster and the Season of Red Summer

description.en:
Alellia, who has had her engagement broken off, is past the marriageable age, and is known behind her back as the "domineering female supervisor." She spends her days performing her duties as the right-hand woman of Marquess Istilia Wegmund, "the cold-hearted prime minister."

One day, while performing her duties, the Prime Minister asks her to marry him.

Rumor has it that the Prime Minister is in love with another woman. Alellia accepts the engagement, believing that she is being asked to enter into a contractual marriage.

A newly-married life with the cold-hearted prime minister begins...!

altTitles.en: Pregnant Wife And The Little Ones

description.en:
He has the absolute power. He kills without hesitation and is a cold, fickle man. Yet he becomes obsessed with her and dotes on her nonstop.  
  
The first time they met, he asked, “Was it you, six years ago?”  
  
The second time they met, he’s holding onto the DNA test, “You still dare to say he’s not my son?”  
  
The n time they met, “Mr. Duke, do you have an end to this?”  
The guy smiled with a deep charm, “The second child have yet to be born. Of course, there’s no end to this.”

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.ja: シャーク

description.en: Sharks don't have lungs, but they do have to breathe oxygen to survive. Instead of breathing air, though, sharks get oxygen from the water that surrounds them. So they have to move around, if they stop moving for a while, they sink into the water and die, So Sharks have to move and move constantly from birth to death. The same goes for you. If you want to survive, keep moving, then you will be the best hunter… like a shark.

altTitles.ja: 僕の彼女はデッカワイイ

altTitles.en: My Girlfriend Is Big and Cute!

altTitles.pl: Moja Dziewczyna Jest Wysoka i Urocza

altTitles.pt-br: Minha namorada é grande e fofa!

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn gái to lớn và dễ thương của tôi

description.en:
For as long as he remembers, Komi has been shorter than his fellow classmates. He always felt inferior as a result, until he met Obinata - a girl who is head and shoulders above him. 

Yes, Asumi Obinata is tall. She’s imposing. But she’s also Komi Amane’s girlfriend. And these two are the happiest kids in the world. 

The super-popular oneshot has been expanded to a full series here!
description.pt-br:
Pelo que ele pode lembrar, Komi sempre foi mais baixo que seus colegas de classe. Ele sempre se sentiu inferior por causa disso, até que conheceu Obinata – uma garota que é muito mais alta que ele.

Sim, Asumi Obinata é alta. Ela é imponente. Mas ela também é a namorada de Komi Amane. E esses dois são as crianças mais felizes do mundo.

altTitles.th: ฮานะมารุ อนุบาลเด็กดีนะจะบอกให้

altTitles.ja: はなまる幼稚園

description.en: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
description.pt-br:
Anzu é uma criança do jardim de infância com uma grande paixão por seu professor Tsuchida, mas Tsuchida claramente prefere Yamamoto, uma jovem professora que lida com a classe ao lado, e Anzu tem suas duas amigas para ajudá-la: a tímida Koume e a excêntrica Hiiragi.

NOTA: Hanamaru é o equivalente à estrela de ouro concedida para as crianças por um bom trabalho na escolas.

title.en: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms
Kuroiwa Medaka is Proof Against My Cuteness

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!! しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

title.en: Touhou - My Condolences for What Happened (Doujinshi )

altTitles.ja: この旅はご主人様でした

title.en: Motokano Sensei wa, Choppiri Ecchi na Katei Houmon de Kimi to no Ai wo Hagukumitai.

altTitles.ja: 元カノ先生は、ちょっぴりエッチな家庭訪問できみとの愛を育みたい。

altTitles.en: Ex-girlfriend Teachers Want to Nurture Love by Making Slightly Naughty Visits to Your Home

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Kano-sensei wa, Choppiri Ecchi na Katei Houmon de Kimi to no Ai wo Haguku Mitai.

description.en: The new teachers at high school student Touma Nijino's school are his ex-girlfriends who dumped him in the past! Moreover, both Akamine Shuri and Shirasawa Kohaku are still in love with him. He is happy to see them again, but.... But he is not happy to see them again... "Hey, can I kiss you?" "Do you hate sleeping with me?" They start competing with each other at the same time, trying to make an already established fact with Tohru before graduation. Moreover, they live in the same apartment complex as Tohru and are trying to secretly nurture their love as a "commuter wife"...? This is a sweet love comedy with ex-girlfriend teachers who tempt you with everything they've got!
description.ja: 高校生・虹野透真の学校に新任教師としてやって来たのは、かつて彼を振った元カノたちだった！　しかもその教師、赤峰朱里と白沢琥珀の二人はどっちも透真に未練がありまくり。思いがけない再会に喜ぶ透真だったが……。「ねえ、チューしていい？」「私との添い寝、嫌いになったの？」卒業までに透真と既成事実を作ってしまおうと、ふたり同時に抜け駆けスタート。しかも透真と同じマンションに住み、「通い妻」としてこっそり愛を育もうとしてきて――!?　全力で誘惑してくる元カノ教師との、甘々ラブコメディ！！
description.es-la: Las nuevas profesoras del estudiante Touma Nijino son sus ex novias que le dejaron en el pasado. Además, tanto Akamine Shuri como Shirasawa Kohaku siguen enamoradas de él. Se alegra de volver a verlas, pero.... No se alegra de volver a verlas... "Oye, ¿puedo besarte?" "¿Odias acostarte conmigo?" Empiezan a competir entre ellas al mismo tiempo, tratando de concretar un hecho ya establecido con Tohru antes de la graduación. Además, viven en el mismo complejo de apartamentos que Tohru e intentan alimentar su amor en secreto como una "esposa viajera"...? ¡Esta es una dulce comedia de amor con ex-novias profesoras que te tientan con todo lo que tienen!

altTitles.ja: 気絶勇者と暗殺姫

altTitles.vi: Dũng giả gục ngã và Công chúa sát thủ

altTitles.en: The Fainting Hero and the Assassin Princesses

description.en: Toto is a novice hero who has finally put together the team that he'd always wanted. And he's ready to set out on a new adventure. But Toto's new party members' actual target is... his life?!

A collection of 9 wonderfully weird and violent short stories from the mind of Kaneko Atsushi. Includes "A Convenient Fiction," "The Paranormal Phenomena Research Society," "BANG! x3," "Eat Meat!," "Hit and Run," "The Thief and the Pencil," "Full of Holes" and others.

altTitles.ja: 烏は主を選ばない

altTitles.en: The Raven Does Not Choose Its Master

description.en:
Yamauchi - a fantastic world where the Yatagarasu, a race of three-legged crows with the ability to transform into humans, live. Yukiya, a young Yatagarasu, is appointed as the personal attendant of the eccentric Crown Prince Wakamiya. Soon, he is entangled in a web of conspiracies attempting to overthrow the heir to the Imperial throne. 

An adaptation of the second book of the award-winning <Yatagarasu> novel series by Chisato Abe. The first book has been licensed in English as [A Raven for All Seasons](https://mangadex.org/title/c22db5fc-726a-41ad-8402-5537e7de2277/karasu-ni-hitoe-wa-niawanai) by [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10162/episode/336576).
description.ja:
シリーズ累計150万部超！ 大人気小説「八咫烏（やたがらす）シリーズ」比翼の漫画化！
「山内（やまうち）」と呼ばれる異世界で、人の姿に転身できる「八咫烏」達が織りなす物語。日嗣の御子の座についた若宮に一年の期限付きで仕えることになった少年、雪哉。だが若宮は「うつけ」と呼ばれるとんでもない人で…。圧倒的スケールの世界観と緻密な筆致でおくる異世界ファンタジー！

title.en: Shiori Experience: My Plain Self and an Odd Old Man

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiori Experience - Jimi na Watashi to Hen na Ojisan

altTitles.ja: SHIORI EXPERIENCE ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~
シオリエクスペリエンス  ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~

altTitles.ru: Shiori Experience: незаурядный Джими и заурядная Я

altTitles.uk: Досвід Шіорі ~Джимі, я і дивний дядько~

description.en:
Shiori was once a guitarist in a light music club in high school. But her first live performance was dashed when her brother ran away from home with a lot of debt, to become a musician in Tokyo.  
  
A decade later, Shiori is now a high school teacher, leading a boring, uneventful life and paying off the debt… till she runs into the ghost of none other than a famous guitarist Jim-you-know-who.  
  
A story of a 27-year-old woman on her way to a music legend begins here.
description.ru: История о Шиори, скромной и неуклюжей 27-летней школьной учительнице, которая любит играть на гитаре и общается с призраком Джими Хендрикса.
description.pt-br: Shiori era uma guitarrista em um clube de música no colégio. Mas sua primeira apresentação ao vivo foi frustrada quando seu irmão fugiu de casa deixando um monte de dívidas para se tornar um músico em Tóquio. Uma década depois, Shiori é agora uma professora do ensino médio, levando uma vida monótona e entediante pagando as dívidas... Até ela dar de cara com o fantasma de ninguém menos que um famoso guitarrista chamado Jim-você-sabe-quem. A história de uma mulher de 27 anos de idade, a caminho de uma lenda musical começa aqui.
